author: Nicholas Jamieson <nicholas@cartant.com>
description: An in-memory, JavaScript mock for the Firebase Web API
name: firebase-nightlight

scripts.dist: yarn run dist:client && yarn run dist:admin
scripts.dist:admin:build: yarn run pre:admin && yarn run dist:admin:clean && yarn run dist:admin:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-dist-admin.json
scripts.dist:client: yarn run dist:client:build && yarn run dist:client:uglify && node scripts/banner.js
scripts.dist:client:build: yarn run pre:client && yarn run dist:client:clean && yarn run dist:client:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-dist-client.json && browserify dist/index.js -s firebaseNightlight -o bundles/firebase-nightlight.umd.js
scripts.dist:client:clean: rimraf dist && rimraf bundles/firebase-nightlight.* && mkdirp bundles
scripts.pre:admin: yarn run pre:clean && node scripts/preprocess.js --admin && yarn run pre:admin:lint
scripts.pre:client: yarn run pre:clean && node scripts/preprocess.js && yarn run pre:client:lint
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run test && yarn run dist
scripts.test: yarn run test:client && yarn run test:admin
scripts.test:admin: yarn run test:admin:build && mocha build/admin/**/*-spec.js --reporter spec
scripts.test:admin:build: yarn run pre:admin && yarn run test:admin:clean && yarn run test:admin:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-admin.json
scripts.test:client:build: yarn run pre:client && yarn run test:client:clean && yarn run test:client:copy && tsc -p tsconfig-client.json && browserify build/index-spec.js -s firebaseNightlightTest -o bundles/firebase-nightlight-test.umd.js
scripts.test:client:clean: rimraf build && rimraf bundles/firebase-nightlight-test.* && mkdirp bundles
